channel.title: Agile Tour Aix Marseille 2017 on The Agile Kaleidoscope
channel.description: Recent content in Agile Tour Aix Marseille 2017 on The Agile Kaleidoscope

item.title: Asmaa & Maria
item.description: Asmaa (left) is a product owner and Maria (right) is a developer. They rather liked to pose together.

item.title: Léo
item.description: Léo is an Agile/Lean coach. He came all the way from Switzerland to talk at Agile Tour Aix-Marseille 2017 in the south of France. Have you noticed the mic is holding? He’s using it to register his podcast “le podcast agile“. I must say I love his t-shirt.
